Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Skills extraction data flow in job-resume matching

Fixed critical bug where required skills were empty during matching despite
successful extraction. The issue was in featureExtraction.service.ts where
the skills chain returns results wrapped in {result: {...}} but the code
was accessing the data incorrectly.

Changes:
- Fixed extractJobFeatures to properly unwrap skillsResult.value.result
- Fixed extractResumeFeatures with same unwrapping logic
- Added safety checks for jobSections.requirements/qualifications
- Improved null handling for experience/level matching (0 score instead of 0.5)
- Added comprehensive validation test suite (20 test cases)

Impact:
- Skills now properly flow through the matching pipeline
- Validation tests show 7/20 passing (35% pass rate)
- FAIR category performing best (5/5 tests passing)
- Remaining issues are scoring calibration, not feature extraction

Test Results:
- test-005 (iOS Match): 90/91 âœ… PASS
- test-007 (Vue.js): 75/79 âœ… PASS  
- test-010 (DevOps): 77/78 âœ… PASS
- All FAIR matches (5/5) passing with correct scores
